price: A dobročinstvo koje mi predbacuješ – da nije to što si sinove Israilove robljem učinio?”
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: watil'ka niʿ'matun tamunnuhā ʿalayya an ʿabbadtta banī is'rāīla
